text: Paul John Anthony (January 23, 1924 – May 21, 1993) was an American professional basketball player. He played for the Tri-Cities Blackhawks in the National Basketball League for one game in each of the 1946–47 and 1947–48 seasons. He competed in several other leagues as well. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:1993 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Pennsylvania Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:People from Glassport, Pennsylvania Category:Tri-Cities Blackhawks players Category:Washington & Jefferson Presidents men's basketball players
title: Paul Anthony (basketball)
